Learned Boost.name: Learned Boost
Learned Boost.flavor: You masterfully channel arcane energy into one of your simplest powers, imbuing it with surprising power.
Learned Boost.effect: Use one of your arcane at-will attack powers on the target. If you hit, you deal +2[W] damage, or +2 dice of damage if it is a nonweapon attack.

Refined Recall.name: Refined Recall
Refined Recall.flavor: A moment of concentration allows you to reclaim the power invested in your faulty effort.
Refined Recall.trigger: You miss every target when using an arcane encounter attack power.
Refined Recall.effect: The attack power is not expended.

Master's Surge.name: Master's Surge
Master's Surge.flavor: With great skill, you increase the power of an oft-used spell to devastating effect.
Master's Surge.effect: Use one of your arcane encounter attack powers on the target. That power is not expended. If you hit, you deal +2[W] damage, or +2 dice of damage if it is a nonweapon attack. You can also increase the duration of any effect the power applies to an enemy to “(save ends).”
